personnal.title: AI & Software Engineer
personnal.description: AI & Software Engineer focused on scalable system design: **distributed services**, **APIs**, **databases**, and **cloud**. Built production AI/LLM/voice agents end-to-end with **clean architecture**, **CI/CD**, **testing**, **observability**, and **performance**.

itemize.title: Tasks
items: Implemented a system of **vocal AI agents** based on **LLMs** to automate the screening step of recruitment, handling **1000+** calls/week.
Conceived a **state machine** software architecture to implement **AI agent interactions**.
Implemented a **web interface** for the **HR** team to manage the recruitment process.
Worked on the integrations with various **ATS** (Applicant Tracking Systems)

itemize.title: Tasks
items: Built the **MVP** and scaled from **0 â†’ 60** large international clients controlling **traffic lights**.
Developed the entire project, including **CI/CD** pipeline, asynchronous architecture, **AI (Reinforcement Learning)**, simulators, and source code.
Led the transition from pseudo-code to a fully operational system.
**First hired engineer**, establishing technical foundations and best practices.

itemize.title: Tasks
items: Prediction of daily base station energy consumption using **Machine Learning**
Development of a website called **Radio Site Energy**
Use of **VueJS** and **FastAPI** to develop the web site

itemize.title: Tasks
items: Development of a website called **Data Voice** using **VueJS** and **Flask**
RNN, NLP, Transformers, GAN, Generative AI, catboost, XGBoost

content.title: Master 2 - Machine Learning for Data Science
IT Department and Project Manager
content.description: GDSC is a science club affiliated with Google to promote technology to young people

itemize.title: Tasks
items: **Supervision** of the IT sections, namely: AI section, web dev, game dev, security, etc

content.Core: Python, JavaScript, FastAPI, Django, Flask, REST API
content.AI/ML: LLM Agents, NLP, Transformers, RLlib, PyTorch, Generative AI, Deep Learning
content.DevOps: Docker, Nginx, Git, GitLab, CI/CD, MLflow, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud

content.title: Intelligent Traffic Light Control System
content.paragraph:
My team and I were selected to participate in a national AI **competition** (AIMx). We designed and developed an **intelligent** system to control traffic lights to **reduce waiting time**. The main AI techniques used for this project are **deep reinforcement learning** and **computer vision**.
**Link** : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HgA-qZcDR7A&ab_channel=GhilesDjebara

content.title: Swarm Robotics for Precision Farming
content.paragraph:
With my team, we have designed a **system of robots** that can work together to perform **precision farming** operations. This project brings together several AI techniques, including **metaheuristic** algorithms, **computer vision**, etc.
**Link** : https://www.linkedin.com/posts/ghiles-djebara-7005b417a_hello-everyone-i-would-like-to-share-with-activity-6859493567258259456-f0Hk

content.title: Data Science - Samsung Innovation Campus
content.description: I received a scholarship fully funded by **Samsung** Algeria to intensively study **Data Science** during 3 months : 5 days/7  for 4 hours. In particular. **Statistics**, **Probabilities**, Machine Learning and Deep Learning

content.title: Scholarship
content.description: I received a scholarship from the French government to study in France. It is awarded to the most deserving students

content.title: Algeria Disrupt - Constantine, 3rd place
content.description: Algeria Disrupt is a **yearly event** organized by the **ministry** to encourage new technologies; we were chosen as the **third-best project** in the AI theme
